body_html:
@mwoodson1 RFFT/IRFFT (1D/2D/3D with gradients for 1D/2D) is now committed internally, once the GitHub sync occurs it'll be available.

Everything is still implemented with cuFFT, so it's GPU-only unfortunately. We're still working on a solution for CPU FFTs.

Everything is still implemented with cuFFT, so it's GPU-only unfortunately. We're still working on a solution for CPU FFTs.
body:
@mwoodson1 RFFT/IRFFT (1D/2D/3D with gradients for 1D/2D) is now committed internally, once the GitHub sync occurs it'll be available.

Everything is still implemented with cuFFT, so it's GPU-only unfortunately. We're still working on a solution for CPU FFTs.
